title: PBE account
body: Can you create PBE account now? Or just tell me when the practice tool will be added in the alpha client.

replies.body:
You can create a PBE account once you've been accepted for PBE access. I don't know when the Practice Tool will extend outside of PBE, but if you'd like more details on how the PBE system works, I recommend checking our [**FAQ**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201751904-Public-Beta-Environment-FAQ#top) out.

If you have any other questions, let me know.

The thing is whenever i want to apply and click " i want to help" it direct me to page saying " error 500" and shows me blitzcrank , heimerdinger or ziggs...i come to click "i want to help" every month and always the same effect... i can't even hit the 2nd step saying " pending".....?!!?

Ah, thanks for clarifying what you're seeing. The 500 error on the PBE signup page is an issue we're aware of and are currently in the middle of investigating. Some players have been able to bypass the error on this page by using a VPN such as [**Cyberghost**](http://www.cyberghostvpn.com/en_us) of [**Hotspot Shield**](http://www.hotspotshield.com/).

I don't have an ETA on when you can expect to see a permafix go out for this issue, but if you have any other questions, let me know.
